page.title: 02St. John's Church.
page.content: {Father Geoffrey Rowe}is vicar. Parts of the church are very old, dating back to Medieval times, but it was restored in its present form in{1936.}The "cure of souls" is shared by a team of three priests.The church is surrounded by a large housing estate in the most rapidly growing part of the town.There are {8,000}people living in the parish. Services are still held on Sundays & mid week and sick people can have services at home.The graveyard is still being used today.The dedication of the church came just before the abdication of Edward VIII,the memorial bosses in the roof are unique.The priest conducts weddings & funerals & baptises children.He also visits the sick,people in prison & schools in the parish {.The church's area is 1 third {of the Withycombe Raleigh parish.
